thread.title: Partnered with eTN – Airport IT and Airport Security 2015
thread.title_full: Partnered with eTN – Airport IT and Airport Security 2015

author: eTN Editor
title: Partnered with eTN – Airport IT and Airport Security 2015
text:
Partnered with eTN – Airport IT and Airport Security 2015 Adv: 
Jul 10, 2015 Adv: 
International Airport Review’s Airport IT and Airport Security conferences will once again bring CIOs, IT Directors, Head of Operations and Security, Security Directors, Lead Security Officers, Security Managers and Security Analysts together to share and discuss their visions for the future. 
This year’s event will also see both Airport IT and Airport Security co-locating in Barcelona, to create one fantastic exhibition space for IT and security professionals from airports and airlines to meet from around the world. 
Both are proud to have eTurboNews as a media partner, and hopes to see this partnership grow and evolve to see future collaborations. With a shared exhibition area, Airport IT and Airport Security look forward to seeing its biggest exhibition yet. The floorplan has recently been released and already it is filling up quickly. 
Airport IT 
International Airport Review’s Airport IT expo will once again bring together CIOs, IT Directors, Head of Operations and Security to share and discuss their visions for the future. 
This year’s event will also see Airport IT co-locating with the ever successful Airport Security event in Barcelona, to create one fantastic exhibition space for IT and security professionals from airports and airlines to meet from around the world. 
Airport Security 
International Airport Review’s Airport Security expo will bring together Security Directors, Head of Operations and Security, Lead Security Officers, Security Managers and Security Analysts to share and discuss their visions for the future. 
This year’s event will also see Airport Security co-locating with the ever successful Airport IT event in Barcelona, to create one fantastic exhibition space for security and IT professionals from airports and airlines to meet from around the world.
